flag.utils

Some utility functions.

flag.utils.close_to(val1: float, val2: float, tol: float = 0.0001) → bool

Compare equivalence of floating point values with a given tolerance.

flag.utils.close_to_array(lst1: list[float], lst2: list[float], tol: float = 0.0001) → bool

Compare equivalence of floating point arrays (list, numpy array, etc.) with a given tolerance.

flag.utils.from_API(api: FVec) → FVec

Compute density at STP from API.

flag.utils.to_API(rho0: FVec) → FVec

Compute API from density at STP.
